title: Chats in Tech: Content Creation & Tech!
description:
Today Leo and Justin talk content creation, it's place in learning, community and the greater society and how tech. plays it's part within that narrative.

Lets jump in!

Check out CopyAI: www.copy.ai?via=leo-guinan
As well as PlaygroundAI: https://playgroundai.com/ 

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!
